exposures.title: Public Speaking
exposures.description: Speaking to a small group with a short introduction about yourself
steps: Prepare a short introduction about yourself (2–3 minutes)
Find a group of 5–10 people (friends, colleagues)
Stand in front of the group and introduce yourself
Share a few of your interests
Answer 2–3 questions from the audience

exposures.title: Riding an Elevator
exposures.description: Taking an elevator ride alone in a multi-story building
steps: Walk up to an elevator in a mall or office building
Press the call button
Enter the elevator and press the 5th-floor button
Stand in the elevator with the doors closed
Exit on the desired floor
Repeat the ride down

exposures.title: Calling a Stranger
exposures.description: Calling an organization to ask for information
steps: Choose an organization (bank, store, clinic)
Prepare your question in advance
Find the phone number
Dial the number
Wait for the operator to answer
Ask your question in a calm voice
Thank them and say goodbye

exposures.title: Introducing Yourself in a Cafe
exposures.description: Starting a conversation with someone new in a public place
steps: Go to a cafe or coworking space
Choose someone who is not busy
Approach with a smile
Start with a simple question (for example, about Wi-Fi)
If the person is open to conversation, introduce yourself
Keep a short dialogue for 2–3 minutes
Politely end the conversation

exposures.title: Walking in a Crowded Place
exposures.description: Walking in a mall or on a main street during busy hours
steps: Choose a crowded place (mall, park)
Go during peak time (weekend, lunch hour)
Walk at a slow pace
Notice the people around you
If needed, ask someone to move a little
Sit on a bench or in a cafe among people

exposures.title: Asking a Salesperson a Question
exposures.description: Asking a store associate for help in a shop
steps: Enter a clothing or electronics store
Find a store associate
Approach and say hello
Ask a question about a product
Ask to see 2–3 options
Thank them, even if you do not buy anything

exposures.title: Speaking at an Online Meeting
exposures.description: Turning on your camera and microphone to share your opinion
steps: Join the video conference
Turn on your camera
Wait for the right moment
Turn on your microphone
Share your opinion or ask a question
Engage in a short dialogue
Turn off your microphone after finishing

exposures.title: Going to the Movies Alone
exposures.description: Going to a movie theater by yourself
steps: Choose a movie and showtime
Buy a ticket online or at the box office
Arrive at the theater 15 minutes early
Buy popcorn or a drink (optional)
Find your seat
Watch the movie on your own
Leave the theater calmly after the show
